body.name: Scosche AFP2WT-SP FrescheAIR Portable HEPA Air Purifier/Deodorizer for Allergies, Pet Dander and Odors, Personal Air Freshener for Travel and Home, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 53 mins
features: SECURE AND PORTABLE: Our portable HEPA Air Purifier/Deodorizer is designed to fit in the cup holder of your vehicle to make your life more comfortable and healthier. The design makes it easy to move from one car to another.

ENJOY CLEAN AND ODOR FREE AIR: Use this portable and personal device to quietly and efficiently capture 99.5% of *PM2.5 small particles and dust. It also quickly neutralizes and releases clean, fresh air for you to breathe.
AUTOMATIC OR MANUAL DUAL SPEED FAN: Comes with two fan modes. Automatic mode switches on when you start your car. Manual mode offers two fan speeds. That way you can set it and forget it.

COMPACT POWERFUL DESIGN: This small HEPA Air/Purifier can be used in your vehicle or home. It’s perfect for taking along with you to purify any other space of your choice, such as cubicles or small offices.

INCLUDED IN PACKAGE: Included in this package is one Air Purifier/Deodorizer device, one replacement H13 HEPA Air Filter, one USB-C Power Cable, and one User Manual. This product is backed by a one year warranty.
body.description: The Scosche AFP2WT-SP FreschAir is a portable HEPA Air Purifier and deodorizer that you place inside your vehicle’s cup holder or stands it on any flat surface, to create a comfortable, healthier environment. If you suffer from sensitivity to dust, pet dander, or odors, this is a must-have accessory. With two modes: automatic, which switches on when you start your car, and a manual mode that offers two fan speeds, you can set it and forget it. The portable design makes it easy to move from one car to another. The 3 stage H13 HEPA filter captures 99.5% of *PM2.5 small particles and dust plus also quickly neutralizes and releases clean, fresh air. Although designed for in-vehicle use, its small, compact size and its ability to purify an average-size vehicle in 15-20 minutes and up to 100 sq. ft of space in approximately one hour make it also great for cubicles or small offices. For best performance, replace the HEPA filter every 3 to 6 months, depending on use. Use the included USB-C charging cable to power the FrescheAir, and you can also charge a second device using the standard USB-A port on the side panel. For use in the home or office, the charging cable can be plugged into a USB home charger or into your laptop‘s USB Port. NOTE: *PM2.5 are fine inhalable particles with diameters that are generally 2.5 micrometers and smaller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mini purifier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product calls itself portable. Product has a "charging" port that is pictured. This product has no battery and must be plugged in at all times to work. The "charging" port is to charge a phone or other device while this device is plugged in. I bought this to use on an airplane. While I couldn't use it for that, I did use it in a conference room next to my laptop so that's something. But, really, this thing is not portable or chargeable.
